Who doesn't like Star Trek???
(For everyone that raised your hand... I now un-friend you, as for the rest...)
Here is another throwback from the days of typing in Basic code to play games...
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/3wxs-7bzlu2tcdshbojk2q/star-trek-v1
This is the version from the book... 
I would describe it more as You and the Klingon ship are doing donuts and shooting at each other,  but I plan on a "better" version where heading and speed determine your location to shoot from.
Any ideas on how to handle the firing angles would help.
